li.label: Weight Opinion: Hate

li.label: Weight Opinion: Dislike

li.label: Weight Opinion: Neutral-

li.label: Weight Opinion: Neutral
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} believes that fat is just fat. While they don't want to be huge, they can appreciate bodies with a little extra weight on them.

li.label: Weight Opinion: Neutral+
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} understands the appeal of the larger form. They appreciate the softness that comes with carrying extra weight and prefer to be heavier themselves.

li.label: Weight Opinion: Like
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a true fat admirer. They would like nothing more than to be fat and will be quite upset if they're not.

li.label: Weight Opinion: Love

li.label: Weight Opinion: Fanatical
